overview: When it comes to imagination, Shayla La Veaux holds the winning hand. Of course, all her overactive libido daydreaming is bound to lead to some kind of creative brainstorm. If it doesn't? Who cares! You'll just be glad you went along for the ride. There's really nothing left to say except, "Sweet Dreams."
tagline: Psst…wake up. You just found the girl of your dreams… Shame on you.
title: Sweet Dreams
